code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}}}%% stateDiagram-v2 [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Pending: Create Comment Pending --> Approved: Approve Pending --> Rejected: Reject Pending --> Deleted: Delete Approved --> Deleted: Delete Rejected --> Deleted: Delete Deleted --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] state Pending {IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> AwaitingModeration AwaitingModeration --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] } state Approved {IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> Visible Visible --> Edited: Update Edited --> Visible } state Rejected {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Hidden Hidden --> WithReason: Add Rejection Reason WithReason --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] } note right of Pending: Comments start in Pending state
and await moderation note right of Approved: Approved comments are visible
and can be edited note right of Rejected: Rejected comments are hidden
with optional rejection reason note right of Deleted: Deleted comments are
permanently removed
